entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -10.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 04:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -10.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -12.5°C
Wind: ESE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Flurries beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
